CustomField.description: This is the user friendly name of the termination code reasons. It is driven from subscription_Expiration_Reason__c that is set on a Stop Transaction
CustomField.formula: CASE( subscription_Expiration_Reason__c, "TAC","American Circ Issue", "TAD","Digital Upcharge", "TAS","Already a subscriber ", "TBP","Bad Phone (Solicited Orders)", "TBS","Stop due to bonus day", "TCM","Changed Mind", "TDB","Database Correction", "TDE","Deceased", "TDN","Did not order", "TDU","Duplicate Account", "TEC","Editorial Content", "TEM","Employee no longer w PMN", "THO","Hospital/Health Related Issues", "TIA","Incorrect address", "TIE","Incorrect e-mail address", "TIP","Incorrect Phone", "TIS","Reads On Internet", "TMR","Misrepresented offer", "TMV","Moving", "TNP","Expired Grace period", "TNR","No reason given", "TNS","No Service Area", "TNT","No time to read", "TOB","Outbound 5 Week Rtn Cancel FD", "TOP","Receives other paper", "TOT","Other", "TPP","Price of Paper", "TPS","Poor Service", "TRI","Rate Increase ", "TRM","Returned Mail", "TSB","Service Charge - Billing", "TSC","Buys Single Copy", "TSD","Switched to Home Delivery ", "TSS","Sample Stop", "TSW","Switched to All Digital", "TTB","Ordered the Tablet", "TTI","Technical or User Experience", "TTO","Term at expiration", "TTR","Tablet Return", "TTS","Travel Section Cancellation", "TVC","Vacation Charge Cancellation", "TVH","Vacation Hold", "TVR","Vacation with Restart", "TVW","Vacation without Restart", "TWC","Wrote Cancel on Subscrbr Bill", "TXP","Shoppers Express Stop", "TZP","Alternate Publication Stop", NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the user friendly name of the Termination Code. To populate create a Stop Transaction
CustomField.label: Expiration Reason
